title: Groad Trip: Gravel’s culture shift on display at USAC nats this weekend
content:
I was keen to experience firsthand how USAC organized the inaugural national championships, even if my personal result was a DNF after a mass pileup

Read the full article at Groad Trip: Gravel’s culture shift on display at USAC nats this weekend on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
